title: ENR Russia glisse dans le rouge, pénalisée par le rouble
cleaned_sentences: Geneva (AWP) - The investment company ENR Russia Invest has scored a heavy loss over the first six months of the year, penalized by a fall of 20% of the ruble compared to the franc.
The activity remains difficult due to international sanctions decreed against Russia, in response to its invasion of Ukraine a year and a half ago.
The Geneva company scored a net loss share of the group of 9.4 million Swiss francs, after a profit of 20.9 million a year earlier, detailed Thursday in Russia in its half -yearly report.
The income was divided by eight to 2.2 million, while the charges were almost multiplied by two to 8.3 million.
As a prospect, the company said "continuing to monitor geopolitical development and the economic environment to decide the measures to be taken", without more detail.
